topics.body:
Well, by the next 6 hours, I'll be taking my flight to England.
It will be a very long flight and it will be tiring.

So, anyone wants to tell me anything before I fly?

Ya know, since I'll be taking Malaysian Airlines which have lost two flights last year due to terrorism and unspecified reasons.

So yeah, I'm also scared out of my skin.
